# mythicbeasts_vps_zones (Data Source)

Returns available VPS zones (datacentres) and hierarchy information. Use zone names from this data source for `create_in_zone` on [`mythicbeasts_vps` resource](../resources/vps).

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_version = ">= 1.11.0"

  required_providers {
    mythicbeasts = {
      source = "paultibbetts/mythicbeasts"
    }
  }
}

data "mythicbeasts_vps_zones" "all" {}

output "vps_zones" {
  value = data.mythicbeasts_vps_zones.all
}
```

### Read-Only

- `zones` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--zones))

<a id="nestedatt--zones"></a>
### Nested Schema for `zones`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `parents` (List of String)
